attributes.action: Enforce the law on cyclists with regard to lights and pavements
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When driving and using a mobile phone is dangerous, so are cyclists who flaut the law and cycle at night without lights, and on the pavement.
Perhaps they should also be made to take out some insurrance.

rejection.details: there are lots of petitions already with similar themes
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
